title: Bug 118780: Column aliases in dataset are not reflected in expression builder
description: When setting aliases for columns in a dataset, the expression builder still displays the old column names instead of the aliases when selecting the dataset.
OB: When selecting the dataset in the expression builder, the old column names are displayed instead of the column aliases.
EB: When selecting the dataset in the expression builder, the column aliases should be displayed instead of the old column names.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a new datasource and dataset.
2. Set an alias for the first column in the dataset as 'column1'.
3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset.
4. Open the expression builder for the data item and select the dataset. Verify that the column alias 'column1' is displayed instead of the original column name.
